Title: The Macabre Case of Prompiram
Actors: Sompob Benjathikul, Rachanu Boonchuduang, Pimpan Chalaikupp, Kamol Sirithranon
Plot: Based on a true crime that took place in a remote Thai village in 1977, a young woman's body is found stranged and raped along a stretch of railroad tracks. Two local police officers are on...
